data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 2, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 4, In Ponta Delgada, Carlos Carvalho of Santa Clara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
In the minute 5, Throw-in high up the field for Guimaraes in Ponta Delgada.
Goal! Guimaraes have got their heads in front thanks to a Andre Andre strike.
That's a fine assist from Ricardo Quaresma.
In the minute 9, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Guimaraes are pushing forward but Rochinha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 10, Rui Costa awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 16, Free kick Santa Clara.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 18, Osama Rashid (Santa Clara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Guimaraes will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santa Clara.
In the minute 20, Santa Clara's Osama Rashid misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
In the minute 22, Santa Clara's Osama Rashid gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 26, Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Goal! Guimaraes extend their lead to 0-2 through Ricardo Quaresma.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Goal! Oscar Estupinan extends Guimaraes lead to 0-3 with a header.
Andre Andre with an assist there.
Rui Costa signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 35, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
In the minute 39, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Guimaraes territory.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Guimaraes.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 45, Santa Clara's Shahriar breaks free at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Shahriar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santa Clara.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Rui Costa has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Santa Clara, close to Guimaraes's area.
Salomao is on a sub for Joao Lucas for Santa Clara.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Santa Clara.
Santa Clara are awarded a penalty at Estadio de Sao Miguel. Osama Rashid takes the kick ... But misses!
In the minute 49, In Ponta Delgada Santa Clara drive forward through Osama Rashid. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Can Santa Clara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Guimaraes's half?
In the minute 52, Rui Costa awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Throw-in for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Oscar Estupinan extends Guimaraes's lead to 0-4.
In the minute 54, Ricardo Quaresma instrumental with a fine assist.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Mikel Villanueva (Santa Clara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Can Guimaraes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ricardo Quaresma (Guimaraes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Guimaraes advance rapidly upfield but Rui Costa blows for offside.
In the minute 64, Miguel Luis is replacing Andre Andre for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Guimaraes drives forward and Andre Almeida gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Santa Clara have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 71, Santa Clara make their second substitution with Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis replacing Costinha.
Lincoln is replacing Ukra for the home team.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Anderson Carvalho replacing Osama Rashid.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Rochinha with Marcus Edwards.
In the minute 74, Joao Henriques (Guimaraes) is making a third substitution, with Nicolas Janvier replacing Ricardo Quaresma.
Rui Costa signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 78, Salomao (Santa Clara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Guimaraes.
Free kick Guimaraes.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In the minute 82, Santa Clara's Mikel Villanueva attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Carlos Carvalho with Lucas Marques. This is the fifth substitution made today by Daniel Ramos.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Oscar Estupinan with Bruno Duarte.
The away team have replaced Pepelu with Andre Fonseca Amaro. This is the fifth substitution made today by Joao Henriques.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guimaraes's half?
Throw-in for Guimaraes at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 87, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Rui Costa awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Guimaraes needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Nene for Santa Clara drives towards goal at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
That's full-time at Estadio de Sao Miguel. The final score is 0-4.
